fields.name: Radio (Passive):
fields.value: Access a facional chat with other Police subaligned players.

fields.name: Police Immunity (Passive):
fields.value: You are never considered to have committed a crime.

fields.name: Confirmed Hunch (Passive):
fields.value: You know the roles of every non-town aligned player in play

fields.name: Mystery Vibraphone.wav:
fields.value: Investigate any player, learn their role and any abilities they use or are used on them and the corresponding feedback
